mc.name: Al-abara's Carpet
mc.oracleText: {5}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures without flying.
mc.printedText: {5}{T}: Prevents all damage done to you by attacking non-flying creatures.
mc.flavorText: Al-abara simply laughed and lifted one finger, and the carpet carried her high out of our reach.

mc.name: Alchor's Tomb
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Target permanent you control becomes the color of your choice. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText: {2}{T}: Change the color of target permanent you control to a color of your choice. Use counters. Cost to cast, tap, maintain, or use a special ability of card remains unchanged.

mc.name: Arena of the Ancients
mc.oracleText:
Legendary creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
When Arena of the Ancients comes into play, tap all legendary creatures.
mc.printedText: All legends become tapped when Arena comes into play. Legends do not untap as normal during the untap phase.

mc.name: Black Mana Battery
mc.oracleText:
{2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Black Mana Battery.

{T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Black Mana Battery: Add {B} to your mana pool, then add an additional {B} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.
mc.printedText:
{2}{T}: Put one counter on Black Mana Battery.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Remove as many counters as you wish. For each counter removed add {B} to your mana pool. This ability is played as an interrupt.

mc.name: Blue Mana Battery
mc.oracleText:
{2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Blue Mana Battery.

{T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Blue Mana Battery: Add {U} to your mana pool, then add an additional {U} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.
mc.printedText:
{2}{T}: Put one counter on Blue Mana Battery.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. Remove as many counters as you wish. For each counter removed add {U} to your mana pool. This ability is played as an interrupt.

mc.name: Bronze Horse
mc.oracleText:
Trample
If you control another creature, prevent all damage that would be dealt to Bronze Horse by spells that target it.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Damage done to Bronze Horse by spells which target it is reduced to zero as long as you control another creature.

mc.name: Forethought Amulet
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Forethought Amulet unless you pay {3}.
If an instant or sorcery spell would deal 3 or more damage to you, it deals 2 damage to you instead.
mc.printedText: Pay {3} during your upkeep or Forethought Amulet is destroyed. If you receive more than 2 damage from a sorcery or instant source, that damage is reduced to 2.

mc.name: Gauntlets of Chaos
mc.oracleText: {5}, Sacrifice Gauntlets of Chaos: Exchange control of target artifact, creature, or land an opponent controls and a permanent you control if they share one of those types. Destroy all Auras attached to those permanents.
mc.printedText: {5}: Sacrifice Gauntlets of Chaos. Take control of target land, creature, or artifact. Then give former controller of that permanent control of a target permanent of the same type under your control. You each control these permanents until game ends. Gauntlets of Chaos does not tap or untap these permanents. Enchantments on traded permanents are destroyed.

mc.name: Green Mana Battery
mc.oracleText:
{2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Green Mana Battery.

{T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Green Mana Battery: Add {G} to your mana pool, then add an additional {G} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.
mc.printedText:
{2}{T}: Put one counter on Green Mana Battery.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Remove as many counters as you wish. For each counter removed add {G} to your mana pool. This ability is played as an interrupt.

mc.name: Horn of Deafening
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn.
mc.printedText: {2}{T}: Target creature deals no damage during combat this turn.
mc.flavorText: "A blast, an echo . . . then silence."

mc.name: Knowledge Vault
mc.oracleText:
When Knowledge Vault leaves play, put all cards removed from the game with Knowledge Vault into their owner's graveyard at end of turn.
{2}, {T}: Remove the top card of your library from the game face down.
Sacrifice Knowledge Vault: Discard your hand, then put all cards removed from the game with Knowledge Vault into their owner's hand.
mc.printedText: {2}{T}: Take a card from your library without looking at it and place it face down under Knowledge Vault. Sacrifice Knowledge Vault to discard entire hand and take the cards under the vault into your hand. If Knowledge Vault leaves play, put all cards under it in your graveyard.

mc.name: Kry Shield
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn by target creature you control. That creature gets +0/+X until end of turn, where X is its converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: {2}{T}: Target creature you control deals no damage this turn, but gains +0/+X until end of turn, where X is the casting cost of target creature.

mc.name: Life Chisel
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a creature during your upkeep to gain life equal to creature's toughness.

mc.name: Life Matrix
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}: Put a matrix counter on target creature and that creature gains "Remove a matrix counter from this creature: Regenerate this creature." Play this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText: {4}{T}: During your upkeep, put one counter on target creature. You may remove this counter at any time to regenerate that creature.

mc.name: Mana Matrix
mc.oracleText: Instant and enchantment spells you play cost up to {2} less to play.
mc.printedText: Pay up to {2} less than required whenever casting an instant, interrupt, or enchantment spell.

mc.name: Marble Priest
mc.oracleText:
All Walls able to block Marble Priest do so.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Marble Priest by Walls.
mc.printedText: All walls able to block Marble Priest must do so. Walls able to block more than one creature can still do so. If blocking wall is compelled to block more creatures than it is legally able to, defender chooses which of these attacking creatures to block, but must block as many creatures as it legally can. Damage dealt to Marble Priest from walls during combat is reduced to 0.

mc.name: Mirror Universe
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Mirror Universe: Exchange life totals with target opponent. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText: {T}: Sacrifice Mirror Universe during your upkeep, and trade your number of live points with opponent. For example, if you had 2 life points and your opponent had 10, you would now have 10 life points and your opponent would have 2. Effects that prevent or redirect damage may not be used to counter this change of life.

mc.name: North Star
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}: For one spell this turn, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to pay that spell's mana cost. (Additional costs are still paid normally.)
mc.printedText: {4}{T}: You may cast one spell this turn by paying its casting cost with any type of mana. For example, {2}{G}{G} becomes {4}. However, the card still retains its original color. This ability is played as an interrupt.

mc.name: Nova Pentacle
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to target creature of an opponent's choice instead.
mc.printedText: {3}{T}: Redirect damage done to you from one source to target creature of opponent's choice.

mc.name: Planar Gate
mc.oracleText: Creature spells you play cost up to {2} less to play.
mc.printedText: Pay up to {2} less than required whenever casting a summon spell.
mc.flavorText: Nireya reached through the Gate, sensing the energies trapped beyond.

mc.name: Red Mana Battery
mc.oracleText:
{2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Red Mana Battery.

{T}, Remove any number of charge counters from Red Mana Battery: Add {R} to your mana pool, then add an additional {R} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.
mc.printedText:
{2}{T}: Put one counter on Red Mana Battery.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. Remove as many counters as you wish. For each counter removed add {R} to your mana pool. This ability is played as an interrupt.

mc.name: Relic Barrier
mc.oracleText: {T}: Tap target artifact.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target artifact becomes tapped.

mc.name: Ring of Immortals
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Counter target instant or Aura spell that targets a permanent you control.
mc.printedText: {3}{T}: Counter target interrupt or enchantment. Can only counter spells which target a permanent under your control. This ability is played as an interrupt.

mc.name: Sentinel
mc.oracleText: {0}: Sentinel's toughness becomes 1 plus the power of target creature blocking or blocked by Sentinel. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText: The * in the lower right hand corner is 1 when cast. While blocking, you may choose to change * to equal one plus the power of target creature sentinel blocks this turn. While attacking, you may choose to change * to equal one plus the power of target creature that blocks Sentinel this turn.

mc.name: Serpent Generator
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}: Put a 1/1 Snake artifact creature token into play. This creature has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter." (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
mc.printedText: {4}{T}: Put a Poison Snake token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 artifact creature. If this creature damages opponent, opponent gets a poison counter. If opponent ever has ten or more poison counters, opponent loses game.

mc.name: Sword of the Ages
mc.oracleText:
Sword of the Ages comes into play tapped.

{T}, Remove Sword of the Ages and any number of creatures you control from the game: Sword of the Ages deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the total power of the creatures removed from the game this way.
mc.printedText:
Sword of the Ages comes into play tapped.
{T}: Sacrifice Sword of the Ages and as many creatures as you choose. Sword does the combined power of these creatures in damage to one target. Sacrificed creatures and Sword are then removed from the game entirely.

mc.name: Triassic Egg
mc.oracleText:
{3}, {T}: Put an incubation counter on Triassic Egg.
Remove two incubation counters from Triassic Egg, sacrifice Triassic Egg: You may put a creature card from your hand or graveyard into play.
mc.printedText: {3}{T}: Put one counter on Triassic Egg. If there are at least two such counters, you may sacrifice Triassic Egg to take any creature from your hand or graveyard and put it directly into play. Treat this creature as though it were just summoned.

mc.name: Voodoo Doll
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a pin counter on Voodoo Doll.
At the end of your turn, if Voodoo Doll is untapped, sacrifice it and it deals damage equal to the number of pin counters on it to you.
{X}{X}, {T}: Voodoo Doll deals X damage to target creature or player. X is the number of pin counters on Voodoo Doll.
mc.printedText:
Put one counter on Voodoo Doll during your upkeep. If Voodoo Doll is not tapped at end of your turn, it does X damage to you and is destroyed. X equals the number of counters on Voodoo Doll.
{X}{X}{T}: Voodoo Doll does X damage to any one target.

mc.name: White Mana Battery
mc.oracleText:
{2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on White Mana Battery.

{T}, Remove any number of charge counters from White Mana Battery: Add {W} to your mana pool, then add an additional {W} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.
mc.printedText:
{2}{T}: Put one counter on White Mana Battery.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. Remove as many counters as you wish. For each counter removed add {W} to your mana pool. This ability is played as an interrupt.

mc.name: Abomination
mc.oracleText: Whenever Abomination blocks or becomes blocked by a green or white creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
mc.printedText: All green or white creatures blocking or blocked by Abomination are destroyed at the end of combat.

mc.name: All Hallow's Eve
mc.oracleText:
Remove All Hallow's Eve from the game with two scream counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if All Hallow's Eve is removed from the game with a scream counter on it, remove a scream counter from it. If there are no more scream counters on it, put it into your graveyard and each player returns all creature cards from his or her graveyard to play.
mc.printedText: Put two counters on this card. Remove a counter during your upkeep. When you remove the last counter from All Hallow's Eve, all players take all creatures from their graveyards and put them directly into play. Treat these creatures as though they were just summoned. You choose what order they come into play.

mc.name: Blight
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.
mc.printedText: If target land becomes tapped, it is destroyed at the end of the turn.

mc.name: Carrion Ants
mc.oracleText: {1}: Carrion Ants gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}: +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "--'War is no picnic,' my father liked to say. But the Ants seemed to disagree."General Chanek Valteroth

mc.name: Chains of Mephistopheles
mc.oracleText: If a player would draw a card except the first one he or she draws in his or her draw step each turn, that player discards a card instead. If the player discards a card this way, he or she draws a card. If the player doesn't discard a card this way, he or she puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText: Every time a player draws a card, that player must first discard a card from his or her hand. If there are no cards in player's hand, take top card from library and place it in the graveyard instead of drawing. This enchantment does not apply to the first card drawn by a player during the draw phase.

mc.name: Cosmic Horror
mc.oracleText:
First strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, unless you pay {3}{B}{B}{B}, sacrifice Cosmic Horror and it deals 7 damage to you.
mc.printedText:
First strike
Pay {3}{B}{B}{B} during your upkeep or Cosmic Horror does 7 damage to you and is destroyed.
mc.flavorText:
"Then flashed the living lightning from her eyes,/ And screams of horror rend th' affrighted skies."
--Alexander Pope, The Rape of the Lock

mc.name: Cyclopean Mummy
mc.oracleText: When Cyclopean Mummy is put into a graveyard from play, remove Cyclopean Mummy from the game.
mc.printedText: If Mummy is placed in the graveyard from play, remove it from the game.
mc.flavorText: The ritual of plucking out an eye to gain future sight is but a curse that enables the living to see their own deaths.

mc.name: Darkness
mc.oracleText: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
mc.printedText: Creatures attack and block as normal, but none deal any damage. All attacking creatures are still tapped. Play any time before attack damage is assigned.
mc.flavorText: "If I must die, I will encounter darkness as a bride,/ And hug it in my arms."William Shakespeare, Measure for Measure

mc.name: Demonic Torment
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.
mc.printedText: Target creature deals no damage during combat. Creature cannot attack.

mc.name: Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore
mc.oracleText:
Non-Eye creatures you control can't attack.
Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore can't be blocked except by Walls.
mc.printedText: None of your creatures can attack except for Evil Eyes. Evil Eye can only be blocked by walls.
mc.flavorText: "The highway of fear is the shortest route to defeat."

mc.name: Fallen Angel
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Sacrifice a creature to give Fallen Angel +2/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Ghosts of the Damned
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The voices of the dead ring in the heart long after they have faded from the ears.

mc.name: Giant Slug
mc.oracleText: {5}: At the beginning of your next upkeep, choose a basic land type. Giant Slug gains landwalk of the chosen type until the end of that turn.
mc.printedText: {5}: During controller's next upkeep Giant Slug gains landwalk ability of controller's choice until end of turn. The type of landwalk chosen must correspond with one of the five basic land types.

mc.name: Glyph of Doom
mc.oracleText: At end of combat, destroy all creatures that were blocked by target Wall this turn.
mc.printedText: All creatures blocked by target wall are destroyed at the end of combat.
mc.flavorText: "He knows he has a short span of life, that the day will come when he must pass through the wall of oblivion . . ."William Faulkner

mc.name: Greed
mc.oracleText: {B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.
mc.printedText: {B}: Draw an extra card and lose 2 life. Effects that prevent or redirect damage may not be used to counter this loss of life.
mc.flavorText: "There is no calamity greater than lavish desires./ There is no greater guilt than discontentment./ And there is no greater disaster than greed."Tao Te Ching 46

mc.name: Headless Horseman
mc.flavorText: ". . . The ghost rides forth to the scene of battle in nightly quest of his head . . . he sometimes passes along the Hollow, like a midnight blast . . ."Washington Irving, The Legend of Sleepy Hollow

mc.name: Hell Swarm
mc.oracleText: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The brightness of day turned in an instant to dusk as the swarm descended upon the battlefield.

mc.name: Hell's Caretaker
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText: {T}: During your upkeep sacrifice a creature and take a creature from your graveyard and put it directly into play. Treat this creature as though it were just summoned.
mc.flavorText: You might leave here, Chenndra, should another take your place . . . .

mc.name: Hellfire
mc.oracleText: Destroy all nonblack creatures. Hellfire deals X plus 3 damage to you, where X is the number of creatures put into all graveyards this way.
mc.printedText: All non-black creatures are destroyed. Hellfire does X + 3 damage to you; X is the number of creatures placed in the graveyard.
mc.flavorText: "High on a throne of royal state . . . insatiate to pursue vain war with heav'n."John Milton, Paradise Lost

mc.name: Horror of Horrors
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a Swamp: Regenerate target black creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
mc.printedText: Allows caster to sacrifice a swamp to regenerate a target black creature.
mc.flavorText:
"And a horror of outer darkness after,/
And dust returneth to dust again."Adam Lindsay Gordon, The Swimmer

mc.name: Imprison
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Whenever a player plays an activated ability of enchanted creature with {T} in its cost that isn't a mana ability, you may pay {1}. If you do, counter that ability. If you don't, sacrifice Imprison.
Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, you may pay {1}. If you do, tap the creature and remove it from combat. Creatures it blocked that no other creatures blocked this combat become unblocked. If you don't pay {1}, sacrifice Imprison.
mc.printedText: Pay 1 each time target creature attempts to attack, block, or tap. That action is prevented and the creature becomes tapped. Destroy enchantment if mana is not paid.

mc.name: Infernal Medusa
mc.oracleText: Whenever Infernal Medusa blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
mc.printedText: All non-wall creatures blocking Medusa are destroyed at the end of combat, as are all creatures blocked by Medusa.

mc.name: Jovial Evil
mc.oracleText: Jovial Evil deals X damage to target opponent, where X is twice the number of white creatures that player controls.
mc.printedText: Jovial Evil does 2 damage to opponent for each white creature he or she controls.
mc.flavorText: "Today, for a lark, let's visit the plains. I'm sure we'll find something to entertain us."

mc.name: Lesser Werewolf
mc.oracleText: {B}: If Lesser Werewolf's power is 1 or more, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn and put a -0/-1 counter on target creature blocking or blocked by Lesser Werewolf. Play this ability only during the declare blockers step.
mc.printedText: {B}: Lesser Werewolf gets -1/-0 until end of turn. Put a -0/-1 counter on target creature that blocks or is blocked by the Werewolf. Use this ability after defense is chosen but before damage is dealt. You may not use this ability to reduce the Lesser Werewolf's power below 0.

mc.name: Lost Soul
mc.oracleText: Swampwalk
mc.printedText: Swampwalk
mc.flavorText: She walks in the twilight, her steps make no sound,/ Her feet leave no tracks on the dew-covered ground./ Her hand gently beckons, she whispers your name--/ But those who go with her are never the same.

mc.name: Mold Demon
mc.oracleText: When Mold Demon comes into play, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice two Swamps.
mc.printedText: When Mold Demon is brought into play, controller must sacrifice two swamps or Mold Demon is buried.

mc.name: Nether Void
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays a spell, counter it unless its controller pays {3}.
mc.printedText: All spells cast are countered unless their casters pay an additional {3}.
mc.flavorText: These days, some wizards are finding that they have a little too much spell left at the end of their mana.

mc.name: Pit Scorpion
mc.oracleText: Whenever Pit Scorpion deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
mc.printedText: If Scorpion damages opponent, opponent gets a poison counter. If opponent ever has ten or more poison counters, opponent loses game.
mc.flavorText: Sometimes the smallest nuisance can be the greatest pain.

mc.name: Quagmire
mc.oracleText: Creatures with swampwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have swampwalk.
mc.printedText: Creatures with swampwalk may be blocked as if they did not have this ability.

mc.name: Shimian Night Stalker
mc.oracleText: {B}, {T}: All damage that would be dealt to you this turn by target attacking creature is dealt to Shimian Night Stalker instead.
mc.printedText: {B}{T}: Redirect all damage done to you from any one attacking creature to the Shimian Night Stalker.
mc.flavorText: "--'Tis now the very witching time of night,/ When churchyards yawn and hell itself breathes out/ Contagion to this world."William Shakespeare, Hamlet

mc.name: Spirit Shackle
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, put a -0/-2 counter on it.
mc.printedText: Put a -0/-2 counter on target creature every time it becomes tapped. Counters remain even if enchantment is removed.

mc.name: Syphon Soul
mc.oracleText: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
mc.printedText: Syphon Soul does 2 damage to all players except caster. Caster gains life points equal to the amount of damage done by Syphon Soul.
mc.flavorText:
"Her lips suck forth; see, where it flies"
--Christopher Marlowe, The Tragical History of Doctor Faustus

mc.name: Takklemaggot
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -0/-1 counter on that creature.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, that creature's controller returns a card named Takklemaggot from its owner's graveyard to play. If Takklemaggot can't be attached to a creature, it comes into play as an enchantment under that player's control with "At the beginning of your upkeep, Takklemaggot deals 1 damage to you" instead and it's no longer an Aura.
mc.printedText: Put a 0/-1 counter on target creature during its controller's upkeep. If the creature is placed in the graveyard, its controller chooses a new target for Takklemaggot. If there are no legal targets, Takklemaggot becomes an enchantment and does 1 damage to the controller of the last creature Takklemaggot was on, during his or her upkeep. Takklemaggot does not revert to a creature enchantment even if other creatures are afterwards brought into play.

mc.name: The Abyss
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of his or her choice. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: All players bury one target non-artifact creature under their control, if they have any, during their upkeep.
mc.flavorText: "An immense river of oblivion is sweeping us away into a nameless abyss."Ernest Renan, Souvenirs d'Enfance et de Jeunesse

mc.name: The Wretched
mc.oracleText: At end of combat, gain control of all creatures blocking The Wretched as long as you control The Wretched.
mc.printedText: At the end of combat take control of all creatures that blocked The Wretched. The Wretched does not tap or untap these creatures. You lose control of these creatures if The Wretched leaves play or if you lose control of The Wretched.

mc.name: Touch of Darkness
mc.oracleText: Any number of target creatures become black until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Changes the color of one or more target creatures to black until end of turn. You choose which and how many creatures are affected. Cost to tap, maintain, or to use a special ability of target creatures remains entirely unchanged.
mc.flavorText: "Black spirits and white, red spirits and gray,/ Mingle, mingle, mingle, you that mingle may."Thomas Middleton, The Witch

mc.name: Transmutation
mc.oracleText: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Until end of turn, target creature's power and toughness are switched. Effects that alter power alter toughness instead, and vice versa.
mc.flavorText:
"You know what I was,/ You see what I am: change me, change me"
--Randall

mc.name: Underworld Dreams
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to him or her.
mc.printedText: Underworld Dreams does one damage to opponent for each card he or she draws.
mc.flavorText: "In the drowsy dark cave of the mind dreams build their nest with fragments dropped from day's caravan."Rabindranath Tagore

mc.name: Vampire Bats
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Vampire Bats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Play this ability no more than twice each turn.
mc.printedText: Flying, {B}: +1/+0 until end of turn. No more than {B}{B} may be spent in this way per turn.
mc.flavorText: "For something is amiss or out of place/ When mice with wings can wear a human face."Theodore Roethke, "The Bat"

mc.name: Walking Dead
mc.oracleText: {B}: Regenerate Walking Dead.
mc.printedText: {B}: Regenerates
mc.flavorText: The Walking Dead are the remains of freakish experiments by the Necromantic Lords.

mc.name: Wall of Putrid Flesh
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Protection from white
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Wall of Putrid Flesh by enchanted creatures.
mc.printedText:
Protection from white
Damage done to wall by creatures with enchantment cards played on them is reduced to 0.

mc.name: Wall of Shadows
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Wall of Shadows by creatures it's blocking.
Wall of Shadows can't be the target of spells that can target only Walls or of abilities that can target only Walls.
mc.printedText: Damage Wall of Shadows receives from creatures it blocks is reduced to 0. Effects that target only walls may not target Wall of Shadows.

mc.name: Wall of Tombstones
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, Wall of Tombstones's toughness becomes 1 plus the number of creature cards in your graveyard. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText: At the end of your upkeep, the * below is set to the number of creatures in your graveyard.

mc.name: Acid Rain
mc.oracleText: Destroy all Forests.
mc.printedText: Destroys all forests in play.

mc.name: Anti-Magic Aura
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells and can't be enchanted. This effect doesn't remove Anti-Magic Aura.
mc.printedText: All enchantments on target creature are destroyed. Target creature cannot be further targeted by instants, sorceries, or enchantments.

mc.name: Azure Drake
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: The Azure Drake would be more powerful were it not so easily distracted.

mc.name: Backfire
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to you, Backfire deals that much damage to that creature's controller.
mc.printedText: For each point of damage done to you from target creature Backfire does one point of damage to target creature's controller.

mc.name: Boomerang
mc.oracleText: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: Return target permanent to owner's hand; enchantments on target permanent are destroyed.
mc.flavorText: "O call back yesterday, bid time return."William Shakespeare, King Richard the Second

mc.name: Brine Hag
mc.oracleText: When Brine Hag is put into a graveyard from play, all creatures that dealt damage to it this turn become 0/2. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText: On the turn during which Hag is placed in the graveyard, all creatures who dealt damage to Hag that turn become 0/2 creatures. Use counters to mark these creatures.

mc.name: Devouring Deep
mc.oracleText: Islandwalk
mc.printedText: Islandwalk
mc.flavorText: "Full fathom five thy father lies;/ Of his bones are coral made;/ Those are pearls that were his eyes;/ Nothing of him that doth fade,/ But doth suffer a sea-change/ Into something rich and strange."William Shakespeare, The Tempest

mc.name: Dream Coat
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
{0}: Enchanted creature becomes the color or colors of your choice. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.printedText: Caster may change target creature's color to any other color. This ability is played as an interrupt. Limit of one change per turn. Cost to tap, maintain, or use a special ability of target creature remains entirely unchanged.
mc.flavorText: "Adopt the character of the twisting octopus, which takes on the appearance of the nearby rock. Now follow in this direction, now turn a different hue."Theognis, Elegies 1, 215

mc.name: Elder Spawn
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, unless you sacrifice an Island, sacrifice Elder Spawn and it deals 6 damage to you.
Elder Spawn can't be blocked by red creatures.
mc.printedText: Elder Spawn cannot be blocked by red creatures. Sacrifice one of your islands during your upkeep or Elder Spawn does 6 damage to you and is buried.

mc.name: Enchantment Alteration
mc.oracleText: Attach target Aura attached to a creature or land to another permanent of that type.
mc.printedText: Switch target enchantment from one creature to another or from one land to another. The controller of the enchantment does not change. New target of enchantment must be valid or this spell has no effect. Treat this as if the enchantment had just been cast on the new target.

mc.name: Energy Tap
mc.oracleText: Tap target untapped creature you control. If you do, add {X} to your mana pool, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: Target untapped creature you control becomes tapped. Add an amount of colorless mana equal to target creature's casting cost to your mana pool.

mc.name: Field of Dreams
mc.oracleText: Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.
mc.printedText: The top card of each player's library is always face up.
mc.flavorText: Some people say that the world is round, and if you travel far enough you'll come to the other side, where everything is upside down.

mc.name: Flash Counter
mc.oracleText: Counter target instant spell.
mc.printedText: Counters target interrupt or instant spell.
mc.flavorText: "She grinned at me--a wicked grin. --'I hope you weren't relying too heavily on that, my dear.'"Medryn Silverwand, Diary

mc.name: Flash Flood
mc.oracleText: Choose one - Destroy target red permanent; or return target Mountain to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: Destroy target red permanent, or return target mountain to owner's hand. Enchantments on target land are destroyed.
mc.flavorText: Many people say that no power can bring the mountains low. Many people are fools.

mc.name: Force Spike
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
mc.printedText: Target spell is countered unless its caster spends an additional {1}.

mc.name: Gaseous Form
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.
mc.printedText: Damage done to target creature by creatures it blocks, or that block it, is reduced to 0. Creature deals no damage during combat.
mc.flavorText: ". . . And gives to airy nothing/ A local habitation and a name."William Shakespeare, A Midsummer-Night's Dream

mc.name: Glyph of Delusion
mc.oracleText: Put X glyph counters on target creature that target Wall blocked this turn, where X is the power of that blocked creature. The creature gains "This creature doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a glyph counter on it" and "At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a glyph counter from this creature."
mc.printedText: Put X counters on one target creature that target wall blocked during this turn; X is the power of the blocked creature. Creature does not untap as normal while it has one or more of these counters on it. Remove one counter during creature's controller's upkeep.

mc.name: In the Eye of Chaos
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays an instant spell, counter it unless that player pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: All instants and interrupts are countered unless their caster pays an additional {X}, where X is the casting cost of the spell being cast.

mc.name: Invoke Prejudice
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent plays a nonartifact creature spell that doesn't share a color with a creature you control, counter that spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: If opponent casts a Summon spell that does not match the color of one of the creatures under your control, that spell is countered unless the caster pays an additional {X} where X is the casting cost of the Summon spell.

mc.name: Juxtapose
mc.oracleText: You and target player exchange control of the creature you each control with the highest converted mana cost. Then exchange control of artifacts the same way. If two or more permanents a player controls are tied for highest cost, their controller chooses one of them.
mc.printedText: Target player and caster each choose one of the creatures they control with the highest casting cost. Exchange control of these creatures. Then do the same for artifacts. Juxtapose does not tap or untap these cards. The control of any enchantment cards played on these permanents is unchanged. If one player does not have an artifact or creature do not trade that type of card.

mc.name: Land Equilibrium
mc.oracleText: If an opponent who controls at least as many lands as you do would put a land into play, that player instead puts that land into play then sacrifices a land.
mc.printedText: If your opponent controls at least as much land as you do, he or she must sacrifice a land for each land he or she puts into play.

mc.name: Mana Drain
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add {X} to your mana pool, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: Counters target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add {X} to your mana pool, where X is the casting cost of target spell.

mc.name: Part Water
mc.oracleText: X target creatures gain islandwalk until end of turn.
mc.printedText: X target creatures gain islandwalk until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: ". . . and the waters were a wall unto them on their right hand, and on their left."Exodus, 14:22

mc.name: Psionic Entity
mc.oracleText: {T}: Psionic Entity deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to itself.
mc.printedText: {T}: Psionic Entity does 2 damage to any target but does 3 damage to itself.
mc.flavorText: Creatures of the Aether are notorious for neglecting their own well-being.

mc.name: Psychic Purge
mc.oracleText:
Psychic Purge deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Psychic Purge, that player loses 5 life.
mc.printedText: Psychic Purge does 1 damage to any target. If a spell cast by opponent or a permanent under opponent's control causes you to discard this card, opponent loses 5 life. Effects that prevent or redirect damage may not be used to counter this loss of life.

mc.name: Puppet Master
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, return that card to its owner's hand and you may pay {U}{U}{U}. If you do, return a card named Puppet Master from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: If target creature is placed in the graveyard, return creature to owner's hand. All enchantments on target creature are destroyed. You may pay {U}{U}{U} to return Puppet Master to its owner's hand if target creature returns to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Recall
mc.oracleText: Discard X cards, then return a card from your graveyard to your hand for each card discarded this way. Remove Recall from the game.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice X cards from your hand and then bring X cards from your graveyard to your hand. Then remove Recall from the game.

mc.name: Relic Bind
mc.oracleText:
Enchant artifact an opponent controls
Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped, choose one - Relic Bind deals 1 damage to target player; or target player gains 1 life.
mc.printedText: When target artifact is tapped, the controller of Relic Bind can choose to do 1 damage to any player or give 1 life to any player.

mc.name: Remove Soul
mc.oracleText: Counter target creature spell.
mc.printedText: Counter target summon spell.
mc.flavorText: Nethya stiffened suddenly, head cocked as if straining to hear some distant sound, then felt lifeless to the ground.

mc.name: Reset
mc.oracleText:
Play Reset only during an opponent's turn after his or her upkeep step.

Untap all lands you control.
mc.printedText: All your lands untap. Reset can only be played on an opponent's turn after his or her upkeep phase.

mc.name: Reverberation
mc.oracleText: All damage that would be dealt this turn by target sorcery spell is dealt to that spell's controller instead.
mc.printedText: Damage from one sorcery spell is redirected to its caster.

mc.name: Sea Kings' Blessing
mc.oracleText: Any number of target creatures become blue until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Changes the color of one or more target creatures to blue until end of turn. You choose which and how many creatures are affected. Cost to tap, maintain, or use a special ability of target creature(s) remains entirely unchanged.

mc.name: Segovian Leviathan
mc.oracleText: Islandwalk
mc.printedText: Islandwalk
mc.flavorText: "Leviathan, too Can you catch him with a fish-hook/ or run a line round his tongue?"Job 40:25

mc.name: Silhouette
mc.oracleText: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn by spells or abilities that target it.
mc.printedText: Until end of turn, damage done to target creature by spells or effects that target it is reduced to 0.

mc.name: Spectral Cloak
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has shroud as long as it's untapped. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
mc.printedText: Target creature cannot be the target of instants, sorceries, fast effects, or enchantments unless creature is tapped.

mc.name: Telekinesis
mc.oracleText: Tap target creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by that creature this turn. It doesn't untap during its controller's next two untap steps.
mc.printedText: Target creature deals no damage during combat this turn. Creature becomes tapped and may not untap as normal during its controller's next two untap phases.

mc.name: Teleport
mc.oracleText:
Play Teleport only during combat before the declare blockers step.
Target creature is unblockable this turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature cannot be blocked until end of turn. Play after attack is declared and before defense is chosen.

mc.name: Time Elemental
mc.oracleText:
When Time Elemental attacks or blocks, at end of combat, sacrifice it and it deals 5 damage to you.
{2}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent that isn't enchanted to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
{2}{U}{U}{T}: Return target permanent to owner's hand. Cannot target permanents with enchantment cards played on them.
If Time Elemental blocks or attacks it is destroyed and does 5 damage to controller.

mc.name: Undertow
mc.oracleText: Creatures with islandwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have islandwalk.
mc.printedText: Creatures with islandwalk may be blocked as if they did not have this ability.

mc.name: Venarian Gold
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Venarian Gold comes into play with X sleep counters on it.
When Venarian Gold comes into play, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step if Venarian Gold has a sleep counter on it.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, remove a sleep counter from Venarian Gold.
mc.printedText: Put X counters on target creature. Target creature becomes tapped when Venarian Gold is cast. Creature does not untap as normal if it has any of these counters on it. Remove one counter during creature's controller's upkeep phase.

mc.name: Wall of Vapor
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Wall of Vapor by creatures it's blocking.
mc.printedText: Damage done to Wall of Vapor by creatures it blocks is reduced to 0.
mc.flavorText: "Walls of a castle are made out of stone,/ Walls of a house out of bricks or of wood./ My walls are made out of magic alone,/ Stronger than any that ever have stood."Chrysoberyl Earthsdaughter, Incantations

mc.name: Wall of Wonder
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{2}{U}{U}: Wall of Wonder gets +4/-4 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
mc.printedText: {2}{U}{U}: Gain +4/-4 and allow Wall of Wonder to attack this turn.
mc.flavorText: So confusing is the Wall's appearance that few of is victims even see it move.

mc.name: Zephyr Falcon
mc.oracleText: Flying, vigilance
mc.printedText:
Flying
Attacking does not cause Zephyr Falcon to tap.
mc.flavorText: Although greatly prized among falconers, the Zephyr Falcon is capricious and not easily tamed.

mc.name: Aisling Leprechaun
mc.oracleText: Whenever Aisling Leprechaun blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature becomes green. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText: All creatures that block or are blocked by Leprechaun become green creatures. Use counters to indicate changed creatures. Cost to tap, maintain, or use a special ability of target creature remains entirely unchanged.

mc.name: Arboria
mc.oracleText: Creatures can't attack a player who didn't play a spell and didn't put a card into play during his or her last turn.
mc.printedText: If a player does not cast a spell or put a card into play on his or her turn, no creatures may attack that player until after his or her next turn.

mc.name: Avoid Fate
mc.oracleText: Counter target instant or Aura spell that targets a permanent you control.
mc.printedText: Counters target interrupt or enchantment. Can only counter spells that target a permanent under your control.

mc.name: Barbary Apes
mc.flavorText: Unpredictable in the extreme, these carnivorous apes will prey even upon their own kind.

mc.name: Cat Warriors
mc.oracleText: Forestwalk
mc.printedText: Forestwalk
mc.flavorText: These stealthy felines have survived so many battles that some believe they must possess many lives.

mc.name: Cocoon
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during your untap step if Cocoon has a pupa counter on it.
When Cocoon comes into play, tap enchanted creature and put three pupa counters on Cocoon.
At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a pupa counter from Cocoon. If you can't, sacrifice it and enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText: Tap target creature you control and put three counters on it. Target creature does not untap as normal while it has one or more of these counters on it. Remove one counter during your upkeep. During the upkeep phase after the one in which the last counter was removed, Cocoon is destroyed and target creature gains a +1/+1 counter and flying ability.

mc.name: Concordant Crossroads
mc.oracleText: All creatures have haste.
mc.printedText: Creatures may attack or use abilities that include the {T} symbol during the turn they are brought into play.

mc.name: Craw Giant
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
mc.printedText:
Trample
Rampage: 2
mc.flavorText: Harthag gave a jolly laugh as he surveyed the army before him. "Ho ho ho Midgets You think you can stand in my way?"

mc.name: Deadfall
mc.oracleText: Creatures with forestwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have forestwalk.
mc.printedText: Creatures with forestwalk may be blocked as if they did not have this ability.

mc.name: Durkwood Boars
mc.flavorText: "And the unclean spirits went out, and entered the swine; and the herd ran violently . . ."Mark 5:13

mc.name: Elven Riders
mc.oracleText: Elven Riders can't be blocked except by Walls and/or creatures with flying.
mc.printedText: Cannot be blocked by any creatures except walls and flying creatures.
mc.flavorText: "Sometimes it is better to be swift of foot than strong of swordarm."Eleven Proverb

mc.name: Emerald Dragonfly
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{G}{G}: Emerald Dragonfly gains first strike until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Flying, {G}{G}: First strike until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Flittering, wheeling,/ darting in to strike, and then/ gone just as you blink."
--"Dragonfly Haiku," poet unkown

mc.name: Eureka
mc.oracleText: Starting with you, each player may put a permanent card from his or her hand into play. Repeat this process until no one puts a card into play.
mc.printedText: Both players may take any permanent in their hand and put it directly into play. Players take turns playing one card from their hand until neither wants to play more permanents. No other spells or effects of any kind may be used while Eureka is in effect. If a spell has an X in its casting cost, X is 0.

mc.name: Fire Sprites
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{G}, {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{G}{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. This ability is played as an interrupt.

mc.name: Floral Spuzzem
mc.oracleText: Whenever Floral Spuzzem attacks and isn't blocked, you may destroy target artifact defending player controls. If you do, Floral Spuzzem deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.printedText: If Floral Spuzzem attacks an opponent and is not blocked, then Floral Spuzzem may choose to destroy a target artifact under that opponent's control and deal no damage.

mc.name: Giant Turtle
mc.oracleText: Giant Turtle can't attack if it attacked during your last turn.
mc.printedText: Giant Turtle may not attack if it attacked during your last turn.
mc.flavorText: "The turtle lives 'twixt plated decks/ Which practically conceal its sex./ I think it clever of the turtle/ In such a fix to be so fertile."Ogden Nash, "The Turtle"

mc.name: Glyph of Reincarnation
mc.oracleText:
Play Glyph of Reincarnation only during the end of combat step.
Destroy all creatures that were blocked by target Wall this turn. They can't be regenerated. For each creature put into a graveyard this way, choose a creature card from the graveyard of that creature's controller and return that card to play under its owner's control.
mc.printedText: Play after combat is over. All surviving creatures blocked by target wall this turn are buried. For each creature buried in this manner, choose one creature from attacker's graveyard and return it to play under attacker's control. Treat these creatures as if they were just summoned. If there are not enough creatures in attacker's graveyard, all creatures in attacker's graveyard are returned to play.

mc.name: Hornet Cobra
mc.oracleText: First strike
mc.printedText: First strike
mc.flavorText: "Then inch by inch out of the grass rose up the head and spread hood of Nag, the big black cobra, and he was five feet long from tongue to tail."Rudyard Kipling, The Jungle Books

mc.name: Ichneumon Druid
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent plays an instant spell other than the first instant spell that player plays each turn, Ichneumon Druid deals 4 damage to him or her.
mc.printedText: Ichneumon Druid does 4 damage to any opponent casting an instant. This does not apply to the first instant cast by that opponent in each turn.

mc.name: Killer Bees
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{G}: Killer Bees gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{G}: +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The communal mind produces a savage strategy, yet no one could predict that this vicious crossbreed would unravel the secret of steel.

mc.name: Living Plane
mc.oracleText: All lands are 1/1 creatures that are still lands.
mc.printedText: Treat all land in play as both lands and 1/1 creatures. They may not be tapped for mana the first turn they are brought into play.

mc.name: Master of the Hunt
mc.oracleText: {2}{G}{G}: Put a 1/1 green Wolf creature token named Wolves of the Hunt into play. That creature has "bands with other Wolves."
mc.printedText: {2}{G}{G}: Put a Wolves of the Hunt token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 green creature with the ability bands with other Wolves of the Hunt.

mc.name: Moss Monster
mc.flavorText: After the battle, an eerie silence gripped the forest. The losers' remains were lightly dusted with green.

mc.name: Pixie Queen
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{G}{G}{G}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{G}{G}{G}{T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

mc.name: Pradesh Gypsies
mc.oracleText: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}{G}{T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

mc.name: Rabid Wombat
mc.oracleText:
Vigilance
Rabid Wombat gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it.
mc.printedText: Wombat gains +2/+2 for each creature enchantment on it. Attacking does not cause Rabid Wombat to tap.

mc.name: Radjan Spirit
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature loses flying ability until end of turn.

mc.name: Rebirth
mc.oracleText:
Remove Rebirth from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante.

Each player may put the top card of his or her library into the ante. If a player does, his or her life total becomes 20.
mc.printedText: Each player may choose to be healed to 20 life. Any player choosing to be healed antes an additional card from the top of his or her library. Remove this card from your deck before playing if you are not playing for ante.

mc.name: Reincarnation
mc.oracleText: Choose target creature. When that creature is put into a graveyard this turn, return a creature card from that graveyard to play under the control of that creature's owner.
mc.printedText: If target creature is placed in graveyard this turn, bring a creature from that graveyard directly into play under the control of the owner of the target creature. Treat this creature as though it were just summoned.

mc.name: Revelation
mc.oracleText: All players play with their hands revealed.
mc.printedText: All players play with the cards in their hands face up on the table.
mc.flavorText: "Many are in high place, and of renown: but mysteries are revealed unto the meek."Ecclesiastes 3:19

mc.name: Rust
mc.oracleText: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source.
mc.printedText: Counter target artifact effect, which must require an activation cost.
mc.flavorText: "How dull it is to pause, to make an end,/ To rust unburnished, not to shine in use,/ As though to breathe were life"Alfred, Lord Tennyson, "Ulysses"

mc.name: Shelkin Brownie
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature loses all "bands with other" abilities until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Remove the bands with other ability from target creature until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Leave a bowl of milk on your doorstep each night for the brownies, or they'll cause you no end of mischief.

mc.name: Storm Seeker
mc.oracleText: Storm Seeker deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player.
mc.printedText: Storm Seeker does 1 damage to opponent for every card in his or her hand.

mc.name: Subdue
mc.oracleText: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn. That creature gets +0/+X until end of turn, where X is its converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: Target creature deals no damage during combat but gains X toughness until end of turn; X is target creature's casting cost.

mc.name: Sylvan Library
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.
mc.printedText: You may draw two extra cards during your draw phase, then either put two of the cards drawn this turn back on top of your library (in any order), or lose 4 lives per card not replaced. Effects that prevent or redirect damage may not be used to counter this loss of life.

mc.name: Sylvan Paradise
mc.oracleText: Any number of target creatures become green until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Changes the color of one or more target creatures to green until end of turn. You choose which and how many creatures are affected. Cost to tap, maintain, or use a special ability of target creatures remains entirely unchanged.

mc.name: Typhoon
mc.oracleText: Typhoon deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of Islands that player controls.
mc.printedText: Typhoon does 1 damage to each opponent for each island he or she controls.
mc.flavorText: Fierce winds ripped across the tropical landscape. What they did not destroy with their fiery breath was washed away by torrential rain.

mc.name: Untamed Wilds
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for any one basic land and put it into play. This does not count towards your one land per turn limit. Reshuffle your library afterwards.

mc.name: Whirling Dervish
mc.oracleText:
Protection from black
At end of turn, if Whirling Dervish dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
mc.printedText:
Protection from black
Gains +1/+1 (use counters) at the end of each turn in which it does damage to opponent.

mc.name: Willow Satyr
mc.oracleText:
You may choose not to untap Willow Satyr during your untap step.
{T}: Gain control of target legendary creature as long as you control Willow Satyr and Willow Satyr remains tapped.
mc.printedText: {T}: Gain control of target legend. If Willow Satyr becomes untapped, you lose control of this legend; you may choose not to untap Willow Satyr as normal. You also lose control of legend if Willow Satyr leaves play, if you lose control of Willow Satyr, or if the game ends.

mc.name: Winter Blast
mc.oracleText: Tap X target creatures. Winter Blast deals 2 damage to each of those creatures with flying.
mc.printedText: X target creatures become tapped. Winter Blast does 2 damage to each target creature that has flying.
mc.flavorText: "Blow, winds, and crack your cheeks rage blow"William Shakespeare, King Lear

mc.name: Wolverine Pack
mc.oracleText: Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
mc.printedText: Rampage: 2
mc.flavorText: "Give them great meals of beef and iron and steel, they will eat like wolves and fight like devils."William Shakespeare, King Henry V

mc.name: Wood Elemental
mc.oracleText: As Wood Elemental comes into play, sacrifice any number of untapped Forests. Wood Elemental comes into play with a +1/+1 counter for each Forest sacrificed this way.
mc.printedText: *s in the lower right-hand corner are set to the number of untapped forests you sacrifice when Wood Elemental is brought into play.

mc.name: Active Volcano
mc.oracleText: Choose one - Destroy target blue permanent; or return target Island to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: Destroy target blue permanent or return target island to owner's hand. Enchantments on target land are destroyed.

mc.name: rathi Berserker
mc.oracleText: Rampage 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
mc.printedText: Rampage: 3
mc.flavorText: Aerathi children who show promise are left to survive for a year in the wilderness. Those who return are shown the way of the Berserker

mc.name: Backdraft
mc.oracleText: This turn, whenever target sorcery spell deals damage, Backdraft deals half that much damage, rounded down, to that spell's controller.
mc.printedText: Backdraft does half of the damage (rounded down) done by one sorcery cast this turn to the caster of the sorcery.

mc.name: Beasts of Bogardan
mc.oracleText:
Protection from red
Beasts of Bogardan gets +1/+1 as long as any opponent controls a white permanent.
mc.printedText:
Protection from red
Gains +1/+1 if an opponent controls any white cards.
mc.flavorText: Bogardan is a land as volatile as the creatures who live there.

mc.name: Blazing Effigy
mc.oracleText: When Blazing Effigy is put into a graveyard from play, Blazing Effigy deals X damage to target creature, where X is 3 plus the amount of damage dealt to Blazing Effigy this turn by other sources named Blazing Effigy.
mc.printedText: When placed in the graveyard from play, Effigy does 3 damage to target creature. If an Effigy is damaged by another Effigy in this manner and is placed in the graveyard that turn, it deals the amount of damage received from the other Effigy in addition to its normal 3.

mc.name: Blood Lust
mc.oracleText: If target creature has toughness 5 or greater, it gets +4/-4 until end of turn. Otherwise, it gets +4/-X until end of turn, where X is its toughness minus 1.
mc.printedText: Target creatures gain +4/-4 until end of turn. If this reduces creature's toughness below 1, creature's toughness is 1.

mc.name: Caverns of Despair
mc.oracleText:
No more than two creatures can attack each combat.
No more than two creatures can block each combat.

mc.oracleText: Dakkon Blackblade's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
mc.printedText: The *s below equal the number of lands you control.
mc.flavorText: "My power is as vast as the plains, my strength is that of mountains. Each wave that crashes upon the shore thunders like blood in my veins."Memoirs

mc.name: Hazezon Tamar
mc.oracleText: When Hazezon Tamar enters the battlefield, put X 1/1 Sand Warrior creature tokens that are red, green, and white onto the battlefield at the beginning of your next upkeep, where X is the number of lands you control at that time. When Hazezon leaves the battlefield, exile all Sand Warriors.
mc.printedText: On your next upkeep after Hazezon is put into play, put * token Sand Warriors into play, where * is the number of lands under your control. Treat the Warriors as 1/1 white, green, and red creatures. If Hazezon leaves play, all Sand Warriors are also removed from game.

mc.name: Hunding Gjornersen
mc.oracleText: Rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
mc.printedText: Rampage: 1
mc.flavorText: "You would never guess, at the terrifying sight of the man, that Hunding was as charming a companion as one could wish for."

mc.name: Jacques le Vert
mc.oracleText: Green creatures you control get +0/+2.
mc.printedText: All your green creatures gain +0/+2.
mc.flavorText: Abandoning his sword to return to the lush forest of Pendelhaven, Jacques le Vert devoted his life to protecting the creatures of his homeland.

mc.name: Jasmine Boreal
mc.flavorText: "Peace must prevail, even if the wicked must die."

mc.name: Jedit Ojanen
mc.flavorText: Mightiest of the Cat Warriors, Jedit Ojanen forsook the forests of his tribe and took service with the Robaran Mercenaries, rising through their ranks to lead them in the battle for Efrava.

mc.name: Jerrard of the Closed Fist
mc.flavorText: Once, the order of the Closed Fist reached throughout the Kb'Briann Highlands. Now, Jerrard alone remains to uphold their standard.

mc.name: Johan
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your combat phase, you may have Johan gain "Johan can't attack" until end of combat. If you do, attacking doesn't cause creatures you control to tap this combat if Johan is untapped.
mc.printedText: If Johan does not attack and is not tapped, any of your creatures may attack without tapping.

mc.name: Kasimir the Lone Wolf
mc.flavorText: Popular indeed is the tale of how Kasimir was once a Holy man who renounced his order to take up the sword. But this tale is no more likely than any other.

mc.name: Kei Takahashi
mc.oracleText: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Prevent up to 2 damage to one creature.

mc.name: Lady Caleria
mc.oracleText: {T}: Lady Caleria deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
mc.printedText: {T}: Lady Caleria does 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

mc.name: Lady Evangela
mc.oracleText: {W}{B}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn.
mc.printedText: {B}{W}{T}: Target creature does no damage during combat this turn.
mc.flavorText: "When milady was young, the sight of a rainbow would fill her soul with peace. As she grew, she learned to share her rapture with others."Lady Gabriella

mc.name: Lady Orca
mc.flavorText: "I do not remember what he said to her. I remember her fiery eyes, fixed upon him for an instant. I remember a flash, and the hot breath of sudden flames made me turn away. When I looked again, Angus was gone."A Wayfarer, on meeting Lady Orca

mc.name: Livonya Silone
mc.oracleText: First strike, legendary landwalk
mc.printedText: First strike, Legendary Land-walk.
mc.flavorText: Livonya's own nature is a matter of mystery. Nothing is known for sure, merely rumors of unearthly stealth, and unholy alliances.
